user_query: the ability to make accurate estimations is a powerful tool , and working through fermi questions is an excellent way to improve your skill . here are a few to get you started : how many basketballs would fit inside the empire state building ? how many drops of water are there in lake erie ? how many gas stations are there in the united states ?
what kinds of activities tend to slow a person ’ s perception of time ?

harry , ken and their siblings were of japanese ancestry , but were all born in the united states . they also spent part of their lives growing up in japan after their mother died . yet when war broke out between the united states and japan , harry and ken stayed in america rather than return to japan , where the rest of their family was living . why do you think they stayed ?

one way that cells can increase their amount of surface area relative to their volume is by folding their membrane . lay a rubber band flat on a table . the band itself represents the cell membrane and the empty space inside represents the volume - the guts of the cell . taking care to not stretch the rubber band , which would change its surface area , use your fingers and make several folds in the band . how does this affect the volume of the empty space even though the surface area didn ’ t change ?
pregnancy places a mother and child at odds . why is this the case ?
